tool_description: One API call to scrape emails, phone numbers and social profiles (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Linkedin, Youtube, etc.) from a website in real-time.
name: Website Contact Details Scraper
title: Website Contact Details Scraper

api_list.name: Website Details Scraper
api_list.description:
Call this api with the website url in the query parameter.
ex: query=https://google.com
